query: SELECT id, name, `trigger` FROM automations WHERE personalId = 1 AND `trigger` IN (SELECT `trigger` FROM automations WHERE personalId = 1 GROUP BY `trigger` HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) ORDER BY `trigger`, id;
